signature: void populateMap(Map<K, V> map, Iterable<? extends E> elements, Transformer<E, K> keyTransformer, Transformer<E, V> valueTransformer)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before populating the map with transformed elements.
Transformers need to be initialized before they can be used to populate the map.
After populating the map, verifying the contents ensures that the transformation was successful.
Asserting the size of the map after population helps verify that the expected number of elements were added.
